DOC.brief_summary: After vaginal delivery, all of the participants will evaluate by using Edinburg depression scale and venous blood sample will obtain. Postpartum depression will consider the result of scale 13 and above according to Turkhish translate. Then leptin, adiponectin and serotonin level will compare between depressed and nondepressed women.
DOC.brief_title: Serotonin, Leptin and Adiponectin Level in Patients With Postpartum Depression: Controlled Study
DOC.criteria: All women who gave birth women with previously diagnosed depression and any psychiatric disorders women with previously take antidepressan and antipshycothic women giving birth to children with anomalies women with undertake surgery for peripartum hemorrhage
